description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. EyeCandy: Chromadose is a dose of visual coolness. Just turn it on and let it do it's thing. Use as a visual backdrop while listening to music, as a screensaver, or perhaps to make your television happy and full of life!
